blogPost.excerpt: I want to request integration X is a common question we all get from customers as makers. The Voting Portal enables users and leads to request their favorite integrations. Try the free plan or get a 20% discount for the first 6 months on the paid plans.
blogPost.body: I want to request integration X is a common question we all get from customers as makers. The Voting Portal enables users and leads to request their favorite integrations. Try the free plan or get a 20% discount for the first 6 months on the paid plans.
blogPost.title: Voting Portal - Track integration requests and streamline your roadmap
blogPost.author: Jake Prins

localize.description: 我想请求集成X是我们作为制造商从客户那里得到的一个常见问题。投票门户使用户和潜在客户能够请求他们喜欢的集成。试用免费计划或在付费计划的前6个月获得20%的折扣。

localize.description: 我想請求集成X是我們作爲製造商從客戶那裏得到的一個常見問題。投票門戶使用戶和潛在客戶能夠請求他們喜歡的集成。試用免費計劃或在付費計劃的前6個月獲得20%的折扣。
localize.tagline: 跟蹤集成請求並簡化您的路線圖

previous.excerpt: This interactive guide will be the first step in helping you get started with analytics. It contains 🧠 the basic concepts and 📚 terminology you need to track your startup’s growth user engagement. 👉 Give it a try: http://guide.june.so/

next.excerpt: Memo enriches your conversations making it super easy to share links, videos, galleries and loads more. Comment on any word, sentence or paragraph in Memo messages. Send longer-form messages with rich media embedded to anyone using their email address.
next.title: Memo - Async conversations with your friends, fans, and team

localize.description: 备忘录丰富了您的对话，让您可以轻松分享链接、视频、图库等更多内容。在Memo信息中对任何单词、句子或段落进行评论。使用电子邮件地址向任何人发送内嵌丰富媒体的长篇消息。
localize.tagline: 与您的朋友、粉丝和团队进行异步对话。

localize.description: 備忘錄豐富了您的對話，讓您可以輕鬆分享鏈接、視頻、圖庫等更多內容。在Memo信息中對任何單詞、句子或段落進行評論。使用電子郵件地址向任何人發送內嵌豐富媒體的長篇消息。
localize.tagline: 與您的朋友、粉絲和團隊進行異步對話。
